# Tender Announcement

## Title
HHTI-LR RFP
TL ITP-LP DS

## Tender Information

* Reference Number: PW-__QD-030-29257
* Solicitation Number: W8476-226536/B
* Publication Date: January 3, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: March 18, 2024, 14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 2, Amendment Date: February 29, 2024

## Description
The Canadian Armed Forces requires a thermal imager for long-range detection, identification, targeting, and tracking of threats or objects of interest within the battlespace. This Request for Proposal (RFP) process aims to acquire the LRF HHTI-LR System, a hand-held binocular device with a laser range finder and a cooled thermal channel.

## Procurement

* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid
* Competitive Procurement Strategy: Best Overall Proposal
* Nature of Requirements: The system will be used by the Canadian Army and the Royal Canadian Navy for various roles, including combat, reconnaissance, and security surveillance.

## Evaluation

* The evaluation will result in 1 evaluation phase, comprised of multiple steps, which will result in 2 contracts, 1 Acquisition contract and 1 In-Service Support contract, awarded to the same company.
